definition: same as 逶 in 逶迤 winding, curved
to entrust/to cast aside/to shift (blame etc)/to accumulate/roundabout/winding/dejected/listless/committee member/council/end/actually/certainly

sentences.english: Is furthermore small and soft to calculate, queen mother this undertaking really has already lost advisability.
sentences.chinese: 再者細細推算，太后此舉委實有失明智。

sentences.english: The students find it difficult to cope with the syllabus of AL Physics.
sentences.chinese: 這些學生覺得高考物理科委實很難應付得好。

sentences.english: Mr. Darcy walked off; and Elizabeth remained with no very cordial feelings towards him.
sentences.chinese: 伊麗莎白依舊坐在那裏，對達西先生委實沒有甚好感。

sentences.english: I often hanker after a little peace and respite from confusion, but it is really hard to come by.
sentences.chinese: 我常想在紛擾中尋出一點閒靜來，然而委實不容易。

sentences.english: I do have such a gorgeous face even if I do say so myself.
sentences.chinese: 假如要我自己說嘛，我委實是個美人胚子。

sentences.english: But his first few months in Beijing were a shock.
sentences.chinese: 但是，最初在北京的幾月委實讓人感到手足無措。
